variants.label: Heading 1
variants.notes: H1 styles can be applied to any text element by using the `heading-xlarge` classname.

variants.label: Heading 2
variants.notes: H2 styles can be applied to any text element by using the `heading-large` classname.

variants.label: Heading 3
variants.notes: H3 styles can be applied to any text element by using the `heading-medium` classname.

variants.label: Heading 4
variants.notes: H4 styles can be applied to any text element by using the `heading-small` classname.

variants.label: Heading 5
variants.notes: H5 styles can be applied to any text element by using the `heading-xsmall` classname.

variants.label: Heading 6
variants.notes: H6 styles can be applied to any text element by using the `heading-xxsmall` classname.
